snippet: The induction ceremony for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame was held in Cleveland for only the third time, but much of the music was rooted in the entertainment capitals of New York and Los Angeles.
abstract: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland holds its 27th induction ceremony, honoring several musical acts, including Guns N' Roses, the Red Hot Chili Peppers, the Beastie Boys and Laura Nyro, who emerged from the entertainment capitals of New York and Los Angeles.
lead_paragraph: The induction ceremony for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame was held in Cleveland for only the third time, but much of the music was rooted in the entertainment capitals of New York and Los Angeles.

headline.seo: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Inducts Guns N’ Roses
headline.main: Anointing Rock Legends From the Coasts
headline.print_headline: Anointing Rock Legends From the Coasts
